Name: HelpLogDir
Value: Set the directory where the log files will be stored.

Name: HelpLogFileName
Value: Set the name of the log file.

Name: HelpLogVerbosity
Value: Set the verbosity of the log file.

Name: HelpConsoleVerbosity
Value: Set the verbosity of the console output.

Name: HelpFillDefaults
Value: Fill missing values with default values for fields that are not required.

Name: HelpEntity
Value: The type of entity to process [OU Group User]

Name: HelpOperation
Value: The type of operation to process [Create Delete Modify]

Name: HelpFile
Value: The file to read the data from.
